saukhya amathyanshaya yatathe athi aanayana aahara palana eekakaye aahara ha aushadha parikshakawarun wisin kiripiti naw thoga sambandhayen regu nishkashana lipi samaga idiripath karanulabana adala sahathika parikshakirima aniwaryayen sidukarana athara siyaluma kiripiti thoga wikirana sandaha sampal gena paramanuka shakthi adhikariya magin parikshakara wikirana adangu nowana bawata thahawuru karanu labayi.kiripiti thoga 04 kata 01 k wana se ahambau lesa labaganna sampal baktiriyawedi parikshanayata saha meda parikshawata saukhya amathyanshaya yatathe athi rasayanagara walata idiripath kara thahawuru karanu labayi.
